scripts.purgecss: purgecss --css public/style/style.css --content views/common/*.php views/components/*.php views/pages/notices/*.php views/pages/*.php views/pages/bikes/*.php views/pages/home/*.php views/pages/opinions/*.php views/pages/rental/*.php views/pages/workshop/*.php views/index.php public/javascript/*.js -o public/style/cleaned/final_css.css
